welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Cerro Maggiore! Get ready to experience the charm of our quaint city, known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Cerro Maggiore has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, mainly serving low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for passenger flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
